title: East bound train service delayed due to track fault

title_translations.zh-Hans: 东行列车服务因轨道故障而延误
title_translations.ms: Perkhidmatan kereta api arah timur ditangguhkan kerana kerosakan trek
title_translations.ta: கிழக்கு நோக்கிய ரயில் சேவை பாதை கோளாறு காரணமாக தாமதமாகிறது

updates.text: UPDATE:Train service from Joo Koon towards Pasir Ris is running well.
UPDATE:Train service on the East-West line slightly delayed in both directions due to earlier track fault.Please allow extra time for travel
East bound train service from Joo Koon slightly delayed due to track fault.  Please allow extra time to travel.
